feed.title: Compatibility requirements for hard or soft forks

entry.title: Compatibility requirements for hard or soft forks
entry.summary: It seems that the term "locked transaction" may refer to a P2SH output, although this use of terminology is unusual given that outputs and transactions are distinct concepts. The context includes two non-text attachments: one with the filename "0xEAD9E623.asc" and the MIME type "application/pgp-keys" with a size of 23337 bytes, and another with the filename "signature.asc" and the MIME type "application/pgp-signature" with a size of 801 bytes.
